entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023
